Articles.Content:
This is an idea thats been swirling around in my head for a while now, i just dont have the patience with all my other inportant space missions going on atm I got the idea from Red Dwarf: Infinity Welcomes Careful Drivers.

I slapped this together in like 10 mins and this is by no means what the final intended product should look like, this is merely a proof of concept. The Idea was make the Panels for each letter as absolutely humongous as possible with enough lights on it to see it from any neighboring solar systems. Then i wanna dock em all together so they spell out "KERBA-COLA GIVES LIFE!"
Awesome Idea. Cant wait to see it in orbit!
I personally like to see how you're going to launch it (20+ struts and quad launchers?)
